tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_97: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.',verse: 5995,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?',verse: 5996,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.',verse: 5997,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.',verse: 5998,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.',verse: 5999,},name: surah_97,};
